author: gabrielaxel
title: Collaborat'n for global risk issues
description: World is rife with existential risk issues, with no ways to orchestrate communities to develop solutions that address it head on.
solution: Cultivate community facilitation for engagement and proposal development aimed at tackling major issues consciously.
experience: Founder: PhD, human cognition & AI ethics, formerly SingularityNET Head of People; decentralized governance innovation; consciousness expert
